subtitleNullable: Perform Text Classification, Summarization in Bengali using this Dataset
descriptionNullable:
This data set contains 14k news articles which have been taken from [here](https://www.kaggle.com/csoham/classification-bengali-news-articles-indicnlp). 

The data set has been cleaned and contains train and test set to benchmark your classification and summarization models.
title: Bengali News Dataset
